threads

Class Threadpool

  • java.lang.Object
    • threads.Threadpool

  • public class Threadpool
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the BlockingQueue "queue" which is necessary for the execution of one time jobs, the BlockingQueue "results", where the results of "nmap" command are placed
    See Also:
    OneTimeJob, PeriodicJob

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Threadpool(int n, java.util.List<java.lang.Thread> threads)
      This is the constructor of a Threadpool object

    • Constructor Detail

      • Threadpool

        public Threadpool(int n,
          java.util.List<java.lang.Thread> threads)
        This is the constructor of a Threadpool object

        The constructor initializes all the fields of Threadpool object

        There are created "n" OneTimeJob threads and a Sender thread

        Parameters:
        n - the number of OneTimeJob threads
        threads - a list of all threads

    • Method Detail

        public java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<NmapJob> getQueue()

        the BlockingQueue where the OneTimeJobs are placed
